ing: 3 fluid ounces Prosecco (such as Caposaldo DOC)
1/2 fluid ounce orange-flavored liqueur (such as CointreauÂ®)
des: "A crazy refreshing bomb of mango flavor and Prosecco! Garnish with fresh mango if preferred."
ins: Pour mango juice, Prosecco, and orange liqueur into a blender in the order listed; add ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a serving glass. Garnish with mint.
